hc_theme_ffx
Firefox theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Theme inspired by https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/styleguide/

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
hc_theme_ffx(...)
</code></pre> 
#### Arguments 
 

...
Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples 
```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_add_theme(hc_theme_ffx())
```
